com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.cognitoidentityprovider

Class CognitoUserSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amazonaws.mobileconnectors.cognitoidentityprovider.CognitoUserSession

  • public class CognitoUserSession
extends java.lang.Object
    This wraps all Cognito tokens for a user.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CognitoUserSession(CognitoIdToken idToken, CognitoAccessToken accessToken, CognitoRefreshToken refreshToken)
      Constructs a new Cognito session.

        public boolean isValid()
        Returns if the access and id tokens have not expired.
        Returns:
        boolean to indicate if the access and id tokens have not expired.

      • isValidForThreshold

        public boolean isValidForThreshold()
        Returns true if this session for the threshold set in CognitoIdentityProviderClientConfig.refreshThreshold.
        Returns:
        boolean to indicate if the session is valid for atleast CognitoIdentityProviderClientConfig.refreshThreshold seconds.

      • getUsername

        public java.lang.String getUsername()
        Returns username contained in this session.

        Reads the username from Access Tokens. Returns null on Exceptions - This would mean that the contained tokens are not parsable and hence are not valid.

        Returns:
        Username of the user to whom these tokens belong.
